heat,"},{"lineNumber":230114,"originalJapaneseLine":"数メートル先さえ見通しの利かない視界は、","translatedEnglishLine":"and visibility, which doesn't allow you to see even a few meters ahead,"},{"lineNumber":230115,"originalJapaneseLine":"自然とあなた達を無口にした。","translatedEnglishLine":"naturally made you all silent."},{"lineNumber":230116,"originalJapaneseLine":"「お、おかしいな……","translatedEnglishLine":"\"T-this is strange..."},{"lineNumber":230117,"originalJapaneseLine":"　こんなことにならないよう、","translatedEnglishLine":"I chose a clear day so something like this wouldn't happen..."},{"lineNumber":230118,"originalJapaneseLine":"　天気のいい日を選んだのに……」","translatedEnglishLine":"...even though I picked a nice weather day.\""},{"lineNumber":230119,"originalJapaneseLine":"「このままだと……少しまずいね……","translatedEnglishLine":"\"If it stays like this... it's a bit bad..."},{"lineNumber":230120,"originalJapaneseLine":"　いったん休憩を取った方がいいかも……」","translatedEnglishLine":"Maybe we should take a break for a bit...\""},{"lineNumber":230121,"originalJapaneseLine":"「ま、待ってーーーー！？」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"W-wait---!?\""},{"lineNumber":230122,"originalJapaneseLine":"「どうした、スシヌ！」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"What's wrong, Sushinu!?\""},{"lineNumber":230123,"originalJapaneseLine":"「ああああ、あれあれ！　あれ！」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Aaaah, that, that! That!\""},{"lineNumber":230124,"originalJapaneseLine":"「アア！？　なんだぁ！？」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Huh!? What is that!?\""},{"lineNumber":230125,"originalJapaneseLine":"スシヌがぶるぶると指先を震わせながら","translatedEnglishLine":"Sushinu trembled and shook his fingertips as"},{"lineNumber":230126,"originalJapaneseLine":"指さす先には二体の、","translatedEnglishLine":"he pointed at two figures,"},{"lineNumber":230127,"originalJapaneseLine":"とても人間とは思えぬ巨大な人型の影があった。","translatedEnglishLine":"giant humanoid shadows that looked nothing like humans."},{"lineNumber":230128,"originalJapaneseLine":"「ああ、冬将軍！」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Ah, the Winter Generals!\""},{"lineNumber":230129,"originalJapaneseLine":"「な、なんすかそれ！？」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"W-what are those!?\""},{"lineNumber":230130,"originalJapaneseLine":"「とーーっても寒い地域に現れる巨人なの」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"They are giants that appear in very cold regions.\""},{"lineNumber":230131,"originalJapaneseLine":"「ただその場にいるだけで吹雪を起こす魔物で、","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Monsters that cause blizzards just by standing there,"}]}

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 同じ魔王の血を引くこども達なら
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: If we are children who share the same demon lord's blood,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 全力で遊んでも大丈夫だよね！
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: then it's okay to play with all our might, right!

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「うふふ、そうだね！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Ufufu, that's right!"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「あっ、でもでも、一番の友達はヒーローだよ！
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Ah, but but, my best friend is Hero!"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: んぎゅー！
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Nngyuu!

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「あはは、くすぐったいよ、レリコフ！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Ahaha, that tickles, Relikov!"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「でも、あんまり無茶しちゃ駄目だよ？」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "But you shouldn't push yourself too hard, okay?"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「えーっ、大丈夫だよー」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Ehh, I'm fine!"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「ヘルマン家、家訓。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "The Herman family motto.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: その八、なにごとも手は抜かない」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Number eight: never half-heartedly do anything."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「ヘルマン家、家訓。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "The Herman family motto.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: その九、でも無理せず体が辛いときは休む」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Number nine: but don’t overdo it, rest when your body hurts."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「はーい」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Okay!"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「ちぇっ、ヒーローは固いなぁ」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Tch, Hero is so strict."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「へへ、だってオイラ、シーラおばさんに
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Hehe, because Aunt Sheila told me

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: レリコフをよろしくねって言われてるもーん」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: to take good care of Relikov."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「ちぇー」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Tch!"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「あっ！　ヒーローあれ見て！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Ah! Hero, look at that!"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「珍しいモンスターだよ！
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "It's a rare monster!"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 戦おう、戦おう、戦おう！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Let's fight, let's fight, let's fight!"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「とーーーーーーっ！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Toooorrrrnnn!" (a battle shout)

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ヒーローの腕の中から
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: From inside Hero's arms,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: くるくるぴょーんと飛び出して
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Relikov spun and leapt out,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: レリコフが魔物に向けて猛ダッシュ。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: and dashed furiously toward the monster.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「も、もう！　だから無理しちゃ駄目だってー！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "S-stay back! That's why you shouldn't overdo it!"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 二人はとっても仲良しだった。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: The two of them were very close.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: レリコフに置いて行かれたあなた達は、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: You and the others left behind by Relikov,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 無理に追うのは諦めて、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: gave up on trying to follow him by force,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 氷雪地帯を一歩ずつ進んでいた。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: and were slowly making your way through the icy snowy region.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「はあ、はあ……はあ、はあ……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Haa, haa... haa, haa..." (panting)

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 隣にいる長田君と会話をしなくなったのは
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: You stopped talking with Nagata-kun beside you

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 一時間くらい前からだった。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: about an hour ago.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 疲労が溜まり、会話をするほどの余裕がないのだ。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Fatigue had accumulated, leaving no energy for conversation.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: どうやらそれは他の皆も同様らしく、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Apparently, it was the same for everyone else as well,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 一行は無言のまましずしずと進んでいく。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: and the group quietly continued on in silence.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ＜ゴォーーーーッ！＞
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: <Whoooooosh!>

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 横殴りの風が襲いかかり、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: A sideways gale struck,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 思わずあなたはその場に止まり耐えた。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: and you unconsciously stopped and endured it on the spot.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 数十分前から始まった吹雪は
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: The blizzard that started several tens of minutes ago

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 未だ止む気配を見せない。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: shows no sign of stopping yet.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 強い風があなた達の体温を奪い、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: The strong wind steals your body heat,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 数メートル先さえ見通しの利かない視界は、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: and visibility, which doesn't allow you to see even a few meters ahead,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 自然とあなた達を無口にした。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: naturally made you all silent.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「お、おかしいな……
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "T-this is strange...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: こんなことにならないよう、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: I chose a clear day so something like this wouldn't happen...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 天気のいい日を選んだのに……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: ...even though I picked a nice weather day."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「このままだと……少しまずいね……
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "If it stays like this... it's a bit bad...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: いったん休憩を取った方がいいかも……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Maybe we should take a break for a bit..."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「ま、待ってーーーー！？」
「どうした、スシヌ！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "What's wrong, Sushinu!?"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「ああああ、あれあれ！　あれ！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Aaaah, that, that! That!"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「アア！？　なんだぁ！？」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Huh!? What is that!?"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: スシヌがぶるぶると指先を震わせながら
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Sushinu trembled and shook his fingertips as

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 指さす先には二体の、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: he pointed at two figures,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: とても人間とは思えぬ巨大な人型の影があった。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: giant humanoid shadows that looked nothing like humans.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「ああ、冬将軍！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Ah, the Winter Generals!"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「な、なんすかそれ！？」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "W-what are those!?"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「とーーっても寒い地域に現れる巨人なの」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "They are giants that appear in very cold regions."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「ただその場にいるだけで吹雪を起こす魔物で、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Monsters that cause blizzards just by standing there,

translationLines.description: Array of objects, each representing a line from the input

originalJapaneseLine.description: The original line in Japanese exactly as it was in the input

translatedEnglishLine.description: The original line translated to English

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 同じ魔王の血を引くこども達なら
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: If we are children who share the same demon lord's blood,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 全力で遊んでも大丈夫だよね！
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: then it's okay to play with all our might, right!

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「うふふ、そうだね！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Ufufu, that's right!"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「あっ、でもでも、一番の友達はヒーローだよ！
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Ah, but but, my best friend is Hero!"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: んぎゅー！
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Nngyuu!

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「あはは、くすぐったいよ、レリコフ！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Ahaha, that tickles, Relikov!"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「でも、あんまり無茶しちゃ駄目だよ？」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "But you shouldn't push yourself too hard, okay?"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「えーっ、大丈夫だよー」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Ehh, I'm fine!"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「ヘルマン家、家訓。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "The Herman family motto.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: その八、なにごとも手は抜かない」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Number eight: never half-heartedly do anything."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「ヘルマン家、家訓。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "The Herman family motto.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: その九、でも無理せず体が辛いときは休む」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Number nine: but don’t overdo it, rest when your body hurts."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「はーい」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Okay!"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「ちぇっ、ヒーローは固いなぁ」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Tch, Hero is so strict."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「へへ、だってオイラ、シーラおばさんに
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Hehe, because Aunt Sheila told me

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: レリコフをよろしくねって言われてるもーん」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: to take good care of Relikov."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「ちぇー」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Tch!"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「あっ！　ヒーローあれ見て！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Ah! Hero, look at that!"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「珍しいモンスターだよ！
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "It's a rare monster!"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 戦おう、戦おう、戦おう！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Let's fight, let's fight, let's fight!"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「とーーーーーーっ！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Toooorrrrnnn!" (a battle shout)

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ヒーローの腕の中から
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: From inside Hero's arms,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: くるくるぴょーんと飛び出して
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Relikov spun and leapt out,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: レリコフが魔物に向けて猛ダッシュ。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: and dashed furiously toward the monster.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「も、もう！　だから無理しちゃ駄目だってー！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "S-stay back! That's why you shouldn't overdo it!"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 二人はとっても仲良しだった。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: The two of them were very close.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: レリコフに置いて行かれたあなた達は、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: You and the others left behind by Relikov,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 無理に追うのは諦めて、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: gave up on trying to follow him by force,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 氷雪地帯を一歩ずつ進んでいた。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: and were slowly making your way through the icy snowy region.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「はあ、はあ……はあ、はあ……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Haa, haa... haa, haa..." (panting)

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 隣にいる長田君と会話をしなくなったのは
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: You stopped talking with Nagata-kun beside you

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 一時間くらい前からだった。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: about an hour ago.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 疲労が溜まり、会話をするほどの余裕がないのだ。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Fatigue had accumulated, leaving no energy for conversation.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: どうやらそれは他の皆も同様らしく、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Apparently, it was the same for everyone else as well,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 一行は無言のまましずしずと進んでいく。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: and the group quietly continued on in silence.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ＜ゴォーーーーッ！＞
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: <Whoooooosh!>

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 横殴りの風が襲いかかり、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: A sideways gale struck,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 思わずあなたはその場に止まり耐えた。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: and you unconsciously stopped and endured it on the spot.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 数十分前から始まった吹雪は
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: The blizzard that started several tens of minutes ago

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 未だ止む気配を見せない。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: shows no sign of stopping yet.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 強い風があなた達の体温を奪い、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: The strong wind steals your body heat,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 数メートル先さえ見通しの利かない視界は、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: and visibility, which doesn't allow you to see even a few meters ahead,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 自然とあなた達を無口にした。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: naturally made you all silent.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「お、おかしいな……
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "T-this is strange...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: こんなことにならないよう、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: I chose a clear day so something like this wouldn't happen...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 天気のいい日を選んだのに……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: ...even though I picked a nice weather day."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「このままだと……少しまずいね……
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "If it stays like this... it's a bit bad...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: いったん休憩を取った方がいいかも……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Maybe we should take a break for a bit..."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「ま、待ってーーーー！？」
「どうした、スシヌ！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "What's wrong, Sushinu!?"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「ああああ、あれあれ！　あれ！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Aaaah, that, that! That!"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「アア！？　なんだぁ！？」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Huh!? What is that!?"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: スシヌがぶるぶると指先を震わせながら
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Sushinu trembled and shook his fingertips as

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 指さす先には二体の、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: he pointed at two figures,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: とても人間とは思えぬ巨大な人型の影があった。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: giant humanoid shadows that looked nothing like humans.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「ああ、冬将軍！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Ah, the Winter Generals!"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「な、なんすかそれ！？」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "W-what are those!?"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「とーーっても寒い地域に現れる巨人なの」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "They are giants that appear in very cold regions."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「ただその場にいるだけで吹雪を起こす魔物で、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Monsters that cause blizzards just by standing there,
